name: Lightunite
description:
Lightunite is a 2D/3D platform game, with "LIGHT" as its core element. The player controls an orb of light that illuminates the dark forest and caves of creepy crawlers. The player can jump, climb, slide and destroy shadow creatures with the power of light.

Controls:
A/D = Left/Right
SPACE = Jump
CTRL = Slide
MOUSE1 = Attack
